item.title: Beogram 4002: Restoration of DC Motor Video Published - Check It Out!
item.description:
I’ve finished my Beogram DC motor restoration video due to high demand! This video will show you how to disassemble the motor and revitalize the Oilite brass bearings by infusing oil under a vacuum. If your Beogram’s RPM is inconsistent, this video is for you! Have a look:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-restoration-of-dc-motor-video-published-check-it-out-/

item.title: Beocord 5000 Type 4923: Tapehead cleaning and playback testing
item.description:
This update on the Beocord 5000 Type 4923 focuses on mechanical adjustments and tape head maintenance. The post begins by addressing the sluggish opening and closing of the cassette drawer. While the belt had been replaced, the issue was traced to friction in the drawer slide mechanism. After disassembling and cleaning the mechanism, applying dry lubricant to the metal posts, and reassembling it, the drawer now operates smoothly. The cassette assembly also underwent a thorough cleaning...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-type-4923-tapehead-cleaning-and-playback-testing/
